name: Arcane Sparks
description: Raw arcane motes siphoned from leylines; basic fuel for spellwork and wards.

name: Runic Focus Crystals
description: Refined arcane crystals used in towers, portals and high-grade enchantments.

name: Planar Core Shard
description: Condensed arcane singularity, dangerously efficient for large-scale rituals.

name: Radiant Motes
description: Soft light aligned with healing, wards and morale-boosting blessings.

name: Dawnfire Shards
description: Concentrated light-and-fire essence, ideal for crusader orders and holy artillery.

name: Sunheart Fragment
description: A blazing core of pure light; cities that house one rarely fall to despair.

name: Umbral Residue
description: Dark seepage from cursed places, used in hexes and fear-craft.

name: Nightglass Splinters
description: Shadow-infused glass favored by assassins and inquisitors.

name: Corruptive Void Core
description: A knot of hunger and entropy; powerful, but steadily poisons what it powers.

name: Primordial Embers
description: Raw fire-aligned primal energy drawn from volcanic vents and battlefields.

name: Stoneheart Pulse
description: Deep earth resonance used to anchor fortresses and empower golems.

name: Gale Whorl
description: Captured wind-spirits, ideal for couriers, ships and rapid-response forces.

name: Verdant Worldseed
description: Living kernel of nature magic that can reshape entire biomes over time.

name: Hoarfrost Shards
description: Cold-bound mana harvested from glacier rifts; good for stasis wards and siege engines.

name: Everfrost Core
description: Unmelting ice-heart that can freeze rivers or shield vaults for centuries.

name: Tidal Droplets
description: Water-aligned mana that rises and falls with the moonlit tides.

name: Stormcurrent Vial
description: Bottled tempest power, prized by admirals and sea-magi.

name: Heart of the Drowned Sea
description: Ancient oceanic nexus, able to sway storms and shipping routes alike.
